meanings.definition: To be carried along by currents of air or water.
meanings.sent1: The leaf drifts gently on the water.
meanings.sent2: The boat drifts aimlessly in the lake.
meanings.sent3: The balloon drifts lazily in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts drift like clouds in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The feather drifts gracefully to the ground.

meanings.definition: A continuous slow movement or progression.
meanings.sent1: The slow drifts of the clouds mesmerized him.
meanings.sent2: The drifts of sand on the beach change daily.
meanings.sent3: The drifts of time seem to speed up as we age.
meanings.sent4: The drifts of conversation filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The gentle drifts of the river carried the boat downstream.
